content.question: The remarks in the excerpt were most likely given in response to which of the following?

choices.label: Political scandals resulting from the president’s illegal campaign activity
Accusations that the adoption of national wage and price controls constituted socialism
The growing concern over escalating antiwar protests and the shooting of students at Kent State University
The discovery that the president had ordered invasions of Cambodia and Laos

content.answer: Political scandals resulting from the president’s illegal campaign activity
